DataElement.preferredDefinition: the count or number of days the patient/participantreceived an agent.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the receipt or administration of an agent by or to the patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

ObjectClass.changeDescription: Updated to add EVS Concept code - dw

Concepts.definition: To take, accept, or get something offered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Determining the number or amount of something.
